signals.summary_hypothesis: Research hypothesis: Compound AX-17 (example) may warrant evaluation for Osteoarthritis in canine.
executive_summary: Compound AX-17 (example): Primary endpoint did not reach statistical significance in target population. Enrollment skewed toward late-stage disease, limiting responsiveness.
Canine inflammatory response may be more responsive to short-term modulation.
Veterinary evidence is weak with 1 cited item(s). Evidence remains limited.
Risk profile is moderate (35/100) with flagged contraindications requiring review.
signals.disclaimer: Research hypothesis only; not medical advice.

signals.summary_hypothesis: Research hypothesis: Compound RN-44 (example) may warrant evaluation for Chronic kidney disease in feline.
executive_summary: Compound RN-44 (example): Insufficient bioavailability at planned dosing window.
Feline CKD progression windows may allow earlier intervention.
Veterinary evidence is moderate with 1 cited item(s). Evidence remains limited.
Risk profile is moderate (55/100) with flagged contraindications requiring review.
signals.disclaimer: Research hypothesis only; not medical advice.

signals.summary_hypothesis: Research hypothesis: Compound LM-12 (example) may warrant evaluation for Laminitis in equine.
executive_summary: Compound LM-12 (example): Trial endpoints focused on short-term perfusion and missed chronic outcomes.
Equine laminitis endpoints differ from human perfusion metrics.
Veterinary evidence is weak with 1 cited item(s). Evidence remains limited.
Risk profile is high. Not recommended for further pursuit.
signals.disclaimer: Research hypothesis only; not medical advice.
